name: Monster Attack
summary: The first-game in Sandlot's Earth Defence Force series, see's the player adorn the-role of a Storm-1 unit deployed with the sole-purpose of stopping the menacing 'ravengers', who have launched a full-scale invasion of Earth with the-intent of annihilating-it, utterly.

alternative_names.name:
The Chikyuu Boueigun
Earth Defense Force 
EDF1
